cgcloud__Account_Extension__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Extension__c
cgcloud__Account_Extension__c.description: This object records account roles and further product-related attributes.

cgcloud__Account_Plan_Type__c.description: Specifies the level of the customer in trade org hierarchies, which is used to aggregate KPIs.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Reference to the customer to whom the Extension record is assigned.

cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Bill To Role is valid.

cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Bill To Role is valid.

cgcloud__Broker_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Broker Role is valid.

cgcloud__Broker_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Broker Role is valid.

cgcloud__Class_Of_Trade__c.description: Reference to which the account the company segment belongs.

cgcloud__Consider_Modules__c.description: Indicates whether the account can be used to list module classification.

cgcloud__Customer_Id__c.description: Reference to the customer to whom the Extension record is assigned.

cgcloud__Customer_Role_Number__c.description: Defines the role number of the customer.

cgcloud__Customer_Role_Price_List_type__.description: Defines the Role Price List type of the customer.

cgcloud__Customer_Role_Price_Type__c.description: Defines the customer's Role Price type.

cgcloud__Customer_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the customer role is valid.

cgcloud__Customer_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the customer role is valid.

cgcloud__Date_Closure__c.description: Date on which the company closed.

cgcloud__Decreasing_PSI__c.description: Indicates whether the previously calculated PSI is higher than the last one.

cgcloud__Decreasing_Revenue__c.description: Defines whether a customer is classified as a decrease revenue customer.

cgcloud__Delivery_Role_Modify_Preset_Qua.description: Specifies the way quantity modifications of preset quantities of delivery documents can be modified.

cgcloud__Delivery_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Delivery Role is valid.

cgcloud__Delivery_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Delivery Role is valid.

cgcloud__Distribution_Issue__c.description: Indicates whether the last relevant call (and then the customer) has distribution issues.

cgcloud__Fund_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Fund Role is valid.

cgcloud__Invoice_Document_Transaction_Ty.description: Specifies how to handle invoice documents regarding payments.

cgcloud__Fund_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Fund Role is valid.

cgcloud__Last_Visit_Date__c.description: Date on which the last customer call was referenced to calculate the KPI.

cgcloud__Match_Code__c.description: Matchcode of the business partner. It is usually a concatenation of several encoded account attributes, such as name, state, and city. For example, KROGER.GA.ATL.

cgcloud__OOS_Issue__c.description: Indicates whether the last relevant call (and then the customer) has Out Of Stock (OOS) issues.

cgcloud__Order_Document_Transaction_Type.description: Mode to handle orders. Specifies payment type and defines detailed behavior of a delivery document.

cgcloud__Order_Role_Order_Template_Block.description: Set a value to control the customer's use of the temporary order template.

cgcloud__Order_Role_Orderer_Type__c.description: Type of the ordering business partner.

cgcloud__Order_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Order Role is valid.

cgcloud__Order_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Order Role is valid.

cgcloud__Org_Level__c.description: Classification of the customer organization level.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Credit_Block__c.description: Indicates whether the customer is credit blocked.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Credit_Rating__c.description: Specifies the credit rating of the customer.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Document_Transaction.description: Mode to handle orders. Specifies payment type and defines detailed behavior of a delivery document.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Overall_Credit_Limit.description: Specifies the overall credit limit of the customer.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Payer Role is valid.

cgcloud__Payer_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the Payer Role is valid.

cgcloud__Payment_Mode__c.description: Preferred payment mode used when taking a payment during order taking.

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: System in which the record is stored.

cgcloud__Pricing_Type__c.description: Determines the pricing type of the customer.

cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Promotion Role is valid.

cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Promotion Role is valid.

cgcloud__RBF_Overdraw__c.description: Rate Based Funding overdraw allowance percentage.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the CustomerExtension record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the customer extension belongs.

cgcloud__Sales_Organization__c.description: Optimize the reading process of account filters in the Trade Calendar and Account Plan.

cgcloud__Sales_Relevant__c.description: Indicates whether the account can be used for sales activities.

cgcloud__State__c.description: Status of the account. Business partner roles can be used to control the status of the account.

cgcloud__Store_Role_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Store Role is valid.

cgcloud__Store_Role_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Store Role is valid.

cgcloud__Tax_Jurisdiction_Code__c.description: Jurisdiction code of location at which taxes are to be paid.

cgcloud__Transfer_Record_Identifier__c.description: Identifies the anchor customer for the promotion transfer process.

cgcloud__Transfer_Record_Identifier_Uniq.description: A unique identifier that contains a combination of transfer record identifier and sales org values.

cgcloud__Week_Day_Share_Profile__c.description: Lookup to the Week Day Share Profile that's utilized for calculations for the referenced account.
